name: zingcab
description: Geolocation-based cab booking system for West Bengal with advanced pricing engine

scripts.build: npm run build:validate && npm run build:check && npm run build:clean && npm run build:package && npm run build:env
scripts.build:validate: node -c server.js && node -c routes/*.js && node -c utils/*.js
scripts.build:check: test -f config/supabase.js && test -f config/routes.json && test -f config/zones.json
scripts.build:package: cp -r server.js routes config utils dist/ && cp package.json dist/
scripts.build:env: test -f .env && cp .env dist/ || echo 'No .env file found - create one in dist/ for production'
